languages.text: Равор — Главный кормчий, неразлучный с кораблем фон Валанциус. Стоит задать ему наводящие вопросы.
The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.
languages.original_text: Равор — Главный кормчий, неразлучный с кораблем фон Валанциус. Стоит задать ему наводящие вопросы.

traits.locale_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.
The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.
The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰与舵手长雷沃密不可分，若是能问出正确的问题，或许能唤起雷沃的记忆。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯家族的旗舰与舵手长雷沃密不可分，若是能问出正确的问题，或许能唤起雷沃的记忆。

languages.text: Das Valancius-Flaggschiff und sein Hauptsteuermann Ravor sind unzertrennlich. Die richtigen Fragen könnten sein Gedächtnis in Gang setzen.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

traits.locale_text: Das Valancius-Flaggschiff und sein Hauptsteuermann Ravor sind unzertrennlich. Die richtigen Fragen könnten sein Gedächtnis in Gang setzen.

languages.text: Le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius et Ravor, son maître timonier, sont tout simplement inséparables. Si vous lui posez des questions pertinentes, il se souviendra peut-être de détails importants.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

traits.locale_text: Le vaisseau amiral des von Valancius et Ravor, son maître timonier, sont tout simplement inséparables. Si vous lui posez des questions pertinentes, il se souviendra peut-être de détails importants.

languages.text: La nave insignia y su maestro timonel son inseparables. Las preguntas adecuadas podrían reavivarle la memoria.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

traits.locale_text: La nave insignia y su maestro timonel son inseparables. Las preguntas adecuadas podrían reavivarle la memoria.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦とマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアとは切っても切れない関係にある。適切な質問を投げかければ、彼の記憶を呼び覚ますことができるかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦とマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアとは切っても切れない関係にある。適切な質問を投げかければ、彼の記憶を呼び覚ますことができるかもしれない。

languages.text: Von Valancius sancak gemisi ve Başserdümen Ravor, yapışık ikiz gibidir. Doğru sorularla hafızası canlanabilir.
languages.original_text: The von Valancius flagship and its Master Helmsman Ravor are inseparable. The right questions may jog his memory.
